name: time_delta
description: Given a date, calculate how long between the date and a given target date, or calculate the resulting date by adding a given time-delta to the date

unit.description: The time-unit in which the difference is given

date.description: The date on which to operate

anyOf.description: The target date from which to calculate the time-delta
The time-delta to apply to the start date (positive → future, negative → past) given in the specified unit
